goal.en: The aim of this course is to help students understand the principle of statistics and the scope where statistics can be applied. Statistics is the foundation of testing hypothesis scientifically for the social science field. Statistics helps convert data to important information and leads to analyses, predictions, and decision makings. After this semester, students are expected to understand the basic theories, to be able to derive important formulas, and to apply statistics to address the issues in business and management.
goal.ch: 本課程引導學生了解統計學原理及其可應用範疇。統計學是社會科學領域進行科學性驗證論述的基礎， 將資料轉為重要的訊息並協助判斷、制定決策及分析預測。預期學生將能理解基本統計理論，能夠進行推導，並能將統計學應用於資料以協助處理管理領域問題。

content.en: The course will extend the idea of sampling distributions and confidence interval to the concepts of how to form a hypothesis and how to set the rejection area based on a single sample. The concept is also applied to the confidence interval an testing based on two samples. Then we will investigate the elements of experiment design and analysis of variable, and we will introduce the simple regression model.
content.ch: 本學期延續上學期課程, 首先從抽樣分配及單樣本的區間估計出發, 延伸至單樣本假設的建立及如何進行檢定, 再至兩樣本下的區間估計及假設檢定. 接著我們將探討實驗設計的要素以及變異數分析, 並介紹簡單線性回歸模型.
